title: Riginac111
author: Riginac111
content: Bitcoin is good asset when you know exactly when to invest in bitcoin, before now I have being reading articles of bitcoin and when I read the articles of bitcoin I do notice new things every time I read of bitcoin. I notice that investing in bitcoin it needs more research to know when due is the perfect time to invest in bitcoin. And I find out that the perfect time a newbie can invest  in bitcoin  is when the price  of bitcoin  is in bear market, like some weeks ago bitcoin drop a different in the market price and its very nice opportunity for short term investors to buy and keep and be ready to sell when the market rise. I was willing to buy bitcoin immediately the price drop but the challenge i have them was I'm  not with cash, but I will be waiting until the price fall again, and if it fall again I will not miss the opportunity of buying bitcoin and keep for long term investment

comments.author: EL MOHA
comments.body: Although the best time to buy bitcoin has always been during the dip periods or the bearish periods but I would say as long as the price is still around $30k or below it is still at its dip. So whenever you have money at hand that time is the best time to buy bitcoin and not longing for a dip in price. Also you could utilize the the Dollar Cost Averaging method, it will be perfect for periods like this

I was willing to buy bitcoin immediately the price drop but the challenge i have them was I'm  not with cash, but I will be waiting until the price fall again, and if it fall again I will not miss the opportunity of buying bitcoin and keep for long term investmentSome ideas that has lead many yo never getting to invest in bitcoin is,The idea of a short term investment where you hope to buy and hold for few days or weeks and perhaps few months let’s say 4-6 months and expect the profits to start pouring in. It often turns out to be some bad idea as, you might get disappointed in the long run. Given that, the level of speculation one can have on bitcoin is one that comes without any guarantee as price might circulate about a region for more time than anticipated and that would promote the wrong idea within an individual. The idea of short term investment is one that pushes people to borrow to invest or redirect money meant for some project for bitcoin investments and you could end up being disappointed.Long term investments always serves you better and it often breaks the barrier of having a predetermined time to take profit off your investment. Also, using DCA to invest ensures you don’t get to procrastinate on your investment choices as there isn’t a specific time to bitcoin investment. What you consider bear or low today was once a bullish trend in time past. That’s how dynamic the market is.

comments.author: johnsaributua
comments.body: Bitcoin is indeed the first asset that introduces blockchain technology and is popular with the community to the wider public from the past to the present,The ups and downs of bitcoin are sometimes followed by altcoins that make bitcoin a role model.I think HODL is a winner, because if you talk to new people when day trading, the profit will be subject to price fluctuations, deducted fees and crypto exchange taxes (if it is regulated in a country).Different story with professionals, enough capital trading strategy and money management.bitcoin is very good for long-term / daily investment according to your beliefs should buy or sell.Indeed, it can go up very drastically or down as well, even so investors are quite a lot and growing, seen by the density of transactions in its explorer, on social media, also in this forum is timeless,bitcoin is quite cheap and almost all countries use it as an asset and legal currency.I use crypto for fees, transactions and partial capital for airdrops in 25% of my portfolio, I am quite comfortable.If you are waiting for the Buy moment just try DCA whenever you have the readiness and opportunity at the best price.

But it wasn't always a good strategy because you dont know when the dip is going to hit or is it going to happen at all.My advice is always to Dollar cost average or you could modify it by investing every week or month so that you can go along with the Bitcoin market price and not get left with the market trend. IF you going to dollar cost average buying Bitcoin for example weekly you can make sure that you always going to make a profit as long as you just selling your Bitcoin when the market price skyrockets or on Bullrun. At the same time not get left out by the movement of the market because you always buying, I mean there are situations when you are just waiting for the dips but then it never happens and the market price already skyrocketed then you lose your opportunity, but if you buy everytime you could easily avoid getting left out.

comments.author: romero121
comments.body: There is no specific time on which bitcoin invest needs to be done. Everytime is good for investment, all that need to be considered is the affordability and the time period one can hold. For now it is good time to invest considering the upcoming halving and the downturn in the market. However the patience is the one that pays off with the profit. Rather than regretting later it is good to make use of the opportunity investing with the smallest amount possible.

comments.author: lionheart78
comments.body: Given the current Bitcoin market trend, I believe the best time to invest in Bitcoin is now.  It meets the needed requirement so far to have a maximum profit since the market is currently at its lower lows, unless the price gets dipper in the later days but we can always average down through DCA.So if anyone has the funds and wants to jump on the Bitcoin bandwagon, do not hesitate, the opportunity has given itself.  Buy now so that you won't regret it later.

comments.author: Ndabagi01
comments.body: Waiting for the bitcoin price to fall before purchasing some bitcoins may not be the ideal strategy to follow while stockpiling your crypto assets. You never know if this is the lowest the price can go, and if you wait for it to go lower, you may be compelled to buy at a higher price later since it did not go lower again. This is where the Dollar Cost Averaging method comes into play to meet your purchasing needs; it will cover for the times you bought at a higher price when the price drops to buy again. Considering the crypto market is big and price movement is unpredictable, we can never forecast where it will go.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: There is no specific time to invest in Bitcoin because every time will be good as long as Bitcoin has promising prospects in the medium and long term. Also, this depends on your investment plans and the extent to which you aspire to achieve investment profits.What scares investors the most is their failure to understand the degree of risk in investing in encrypted assets, and that investing in bitcoin may be considered the least risky of all, especially if it is a long-term investment. They are usually small investors or new investors. It would be better for them to invest in small amounts.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Keep in mind that when one is considering to buy Bitcoin or any other asset one is not only supposed to check the time of the market but also how personal finances are going. When an investment or purchase of a speculative asset is within the realm of consideration it must be because there are some savings or spare money to be out at some degree of risk, otherwise it would be counter productive to try to invest with money one is not supposed to touch that way. Both the market and our finances are supposed to be in the correct timing in order to get the maximum of possible benefits out of positions. That is my personal take, at least. A dip is useless if there is no reliable liquidity.
